body.p: In this plugin, some configurations will use agenda to define:

ul.li: Check period (when checks will be executed: all days 24h/24, only works hours from Monday to Friday....)
Notification period (when notifications will be sent: all days 24h/24, only works hours from Monday to Friday....)

body.p: To access to this menu, go on Setup > Dropdowns > Agendas
You create agendas and set days and hours when action will be executed.
